oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Names for Colours, etc. Given by /han=kasso (L VIII.-7. 6601, 6606 and 6605 rev., 24. 8170). The names of different colours given by |han=kass'o (possibly, Lucy Lloyd thinks later in 1897, in response to a painted card).
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: names of colours
